commands.newM: Start a new chat with mask

home.deleteChat: Confirm to delete the selected conversation?

reset.title: Reset All Settings
reset.subTitle: Reset all setting items to default
reset.confirm: Confirm to reset all settings to default?

clear.title: Clear All Data
clear.subTitle: Clear all messages and settings

store.botHello: Hello! How can I assist you today?
store.error: Something went wrong, please try again later.

prompt.history: This is a summary of the chat history as a recap: {{content}}
prompt.topic: Please generate a four to five word title summarizing our conversation without any lead-in, punctuation, quotation marks, periods, symbols, bold text, or additional text. Remove enclosing quotation marks.
prompt.summarize: Summarize the discussion briefly in 200 words or less to use as a prompt for future context.

copy.failed: Copy failed, please grant permission to access clipboard

newChat.confirmNoShow: Confirm to disable？You can enable it in settings later.
